TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Bot.Schema.Teams.MessagingExtensionResult> SelectItemHandlerAsync<TState>(ITurnContext turnContext, TState turnState, object item, CancellationToken cancellationToken) where TState : TurnState;
.class public auto ansi sealed SelectItemHandlerAsync`1<(class Microsoft.Teams.AI.State.TurnState) TState> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function SelectItemHandlerAsync(Of TState)(turnContext As ITurnContext, turnState As TState, item As Object, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of MessagingExtensionResult)
type SelectItemHandlerAsync<'State (requires 'State :> TurnState)> = delegate of ITurnContext * 'State * obj * CancellationToken -> Task<MessagingExtensionResult>

Docs.typeparam: Type of the turn state. This allows for strongly typed access to the turn state.
Docs.param: A strongly-typed context object for this turn.
The turn state object that stores arbitrary data for this turn.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Docs.summary: Function for handling Message Extension selecting item events.
